description: The Pohnpei Division of the FSM Department of Health & Social Affairs held its first Gender Equality and Gender-Based Violence (GBV) training for new staff. The training aims to support new staff of the Department to better understand issues relating to gender equality and social inclusion (GESI), gender-based violence (GBV), intersectionality and how these issues directly relate to their everyday life and work within government.
name: First Gender Equality and Gender-Based Violence (GBV) Staff Workshop - Pohnpei Division of the FSM Department of Health & Social Affairs
